name: Slime Sim
description:
Some slime bouncing around in a 2D platform.

Prototype build upon the theme of game feel for NYU's Game Design Course. The goal was to utilize different game feel elements by adding JUICE. The prototype is a 2D platformer built around the concept of the player, the slime.

PRESENTATION on game design

CREDITS:

SFX: jumping and landing + walking + collision

MUSIC: Solve The Puzzle
